ADVENT.Message: By Alvin Files and Scott Adams Dedicated to Ray Harshaw!
Sign: He who defiles the tombs of Egypt shall surely perish!
ARRGH! Poison needle in the lock.
I don't see any reason to throw a
The nomad stuck out his tongue at me.
What! The nomad jumped me while my back was turned!
Nomad vanishes in a puff of yellow smoke.
Mummy has me by the throat!
You be weird. Cut that out.
Cobra crawls out, presses a loose brick and then disappears intoa passage which appeared.
Skeleton places skull on his shoulders, grasps
I just caught dengue fever. Very bad.
Mural: Seek ye well the HEART of Iron.
Ruby falls into pool of acid, burns up.
A tiny voice says: `SEARCH AND YE SHALL FIND!`
I can't lift it. This is a big oyster
Glove falls off my sweaty hand
Mirrors EVERYWHERE! Light blinds me, so I shut it OFF!
Pharoah's heart is red like yours, yet evil has darkened it!
1000 years bad luck starts with a cave in!
I feel a coin on the floor

Item.Text: Iron statue of Pharoah seated on throne
